string.text: Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
I don't have anything for you, but I know someone who might. I've marked his location on your map.
Good luck stalker.
Mutant Safari
You have been tasked to lead a group of tourists on a mutant hunt.

I have a group of tourists coming through and they want to see what it's like to kill a mutant. Take them out on a hunt, give them a thrill. Just make sure they don't get themselves killed. It's bad for business.
Back from the hunt? Good. Here is your payment.
Rookie Initiation
Take a group of rookies into the Zone and show them how to survive.

The new rookies in the camp are very green. I'm concerned they won't last a day in the Zone. It's bad for business if they die, you see? That many less customers for me. I want you to take them on an expedition into the Zone. Tell them what to watch out for, show them an anomoly, teach them how to stay alive.
Ah, my customers are still alive. And they need to buy more ammo from me, hehe. Thank you stalker. Take this for your trouble.
Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
A friend of mine could use your services. I've marked his location on your map.
Good luck stalker.
Rescue Missing Stalker
A stalker is missing from Xenotech's camp. Find him.

I need your help. A stalker from my camp went out for supplies and hasn't come back. I fear something may have happened to him. I will mark his last known location on your map, see if you can find him.
You saved him! Excellent work stalker. Take this as a sign of my gratitude.
Track Wounded Attacker
A rogue military squad attacked Xenotech's camp and murdered them. One of the attackers managed to escape. Track him down.

Where have you been? A military squad came through here and tore up the place. Between them and that damn helicopter they wiped out nearly everyone in the camp. We were able to take out most of them, but one of them managed to get away. He may be injured, see if you can follow the blood trail. I'll show you the direction he was headed.
Thank you stalker. Take this as a gift for your actions.
Burning Bridges
Sidorovich will get you out of your current faction commitments for a modest fee of 10,000 RU.

Well, it's good you've come to me then. I have a lot of connections here in the Zone. I can get you out of your commitment to your faction, but it won't be cheap. I will need to grease some palms, you know. If you can get me, say... 10,000 RU I'll see what I can do for you.
Ah, this should do well. I'll make the necessary arrangements, enjoy your new life as a Free Stalker.
Assault the car park
Stage an assault on the car park and eliminate the bandits that occupy the location.

Bandits have taken up base in the old car park. Those assholes mug or kill anyone who use the roads leading in and out of the camp. It's disrupting local activities for my clients and the stalkers who take refuge in camp. It's hurting business! I need you to 'take care' of them. Talk to Fanatic if you need any help.
Great work, stalker! You and I will be best of friends if you keep this up! Here is what I promised.
Contract killer
Sidorovich contracted you to run a hit. Find and eliminate the target then return to Sidorovich for payment.

I have a list of outstanding bounties and stalkers that need taken care of. The worst kind of scum and villainy usually end up on this list... for various reasons. The Zone needs its trash taken out from time to time. What do you say, stalker, will you be my hired gun?
Good, you got rid of that asshole! Here is what I promised.
Mobbing the Mob
Sidorovich wants to get rid of the bandit bullies. Collect %s.

Listen, stalker. This is supposed to be a safe place for rookies to get to know the Zone. What they do get to know are the business ends of some bandit guns instead. The thugs disrupt our routes and steal our loot. Go teach them a lesson, will ya?

Listen, stalker. This is supposed to be a safe place for rookies to get to know the Zone. What they do get to know are the business ends of some bandit guns instead. The thugs disrupt our routes and steal our loot. Go teach them a lesson, will ya? Get me some %s.
Finally, you're back. You've got the badges? All right, here is your reward.
Eliminate Mutant Threat from Cordon

Wolf asked you to purge an area of all mutant threat in order to ensure the safety of rookie village; as well as the stalkers who pass through Cordon. Reach the location and eliminate all mutants around the area. Return to Wolf for payment after you job is complete.

Stalker, I need someone who is a bit braver than the other rookies for this task. Cordon is becoming a very dangerous place with all this rampant mutant breeding going on. I need you to hunt around an area that I will mark on your PDA. The job is to kill any mutants you see. If you do this for me, it will earn you some cash. So will you?
Thank you, the rookies will be much safer now because of you. Here is your payment.
Find the missing Stalker
Search for the missing stalker.
A stalker is missing from the camp. I need you to go find out what sort of trouble he's gotten himself into.
Thank you. It's stalkers like you that keep this place one of the only safe areas in the Zone.
Stalker Guide
Lead a group of rookies into the Zone.
A group of rookies is heading out into the Zone for the first time. I need a competent stalker to guide them and keep them safe.
Thank you for keeping the rookies safe, stalker.
Find %s
Nimble has asked you to find a specific firearm. It needs to be in mint condition. Return to him when you find what he is looking for.
I have a client looking for a specific firearm and I need someone to help me find it. If you are interested I will give you more details. What do you say?

%s... That is what I need, but it must be in mint condition. The client is paying top dollar, and he doesn't want a rusty piece of shit that will jam up in a life or death situation. I'll give you most of the profit since you are doing all the work. Come back when you find it, man.
This is a fine weapon. I think my client will be pleased when I deliver this to him. Here is what I owe you.
Retrieve PDA for Nimble
Nimble has a PDA he needs retrieved.
I need you to pick up a PDA for me. It's hidden in a spot a little while away from here.
Thank you stalker!
Find %s
%s are required by Xenotech to install basic equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.

I need a favour, man. A lot of stalkers come by here asking if I can tune their weapons a certain way but I can't. I just don't have the right tools. I would be able to perform upgrades on a greater variety of equipment if I can just get my hands on the right tools. Please, man, will you help me out?
I need a set of basic tools. It should contain what I need. If you can bring some back for me, I will be grateful; I will even offer you a discount from here on out.
Okay, yeah, this is exactly what I need. Here. I promised you a payment. Take it.
Find %s
%s are required by Xenotech to install advanced equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.

My business is booming now; more and more stalkers come to me when they need their weapon fine-tuned... but I could really use more tools. You brought me a quality toolkit last time, but I need an even higher quality set. If you're up for it, I will tell you what I need.
I need an %s. If you can bring one back for me, I will be grateful; I will even pay you for it.
Yes, yes! Here is some cash; you deserve it.
Find %s
%s are required by Xenotech to install expert equipment upgrades, you should bring them back to him if you find any.

My business is booming now; more and more stalkers come to me when they need their weapon fine-tuned... but I could really use more tools. You brought me a quality toolkit last time, but I need an even higher quality set. If you're up for it, I will tell you what I need.
I need an %s. If you can bring one back for me, I will be grateful; I will even pay you for it.
Yes, yes! Here is some cash; you deserve it.
Collect %s
Zhurov has asked me to bring %s.
The top brass has launched an unofficial program, you wanna take part? As proof, I require patches from criminals in the Zone.
The top brass has launched an unofficial program, you wanna take part? You can gather %s - don't strain yourself!
Hah, you're certainly no slouch. Nice work - here's your reward.
Find %s
Seryoga, a military technician, has asked me to find %s.
I do, actually. We recently left all our tools at the research complex in Yantar, which is why I can't even repair the BTR here. I need tools - basic ones. Mind helping out?
I do, actually. We recently left all our tools at the research complex in Yantar, which is why I can't even repair the BTR here. I need tools - basic ones. Mind helping out?
Thank you so much! I will give you a discount.
Find %s
Seryoga, a military technician, has asked me to find %s.
Sadly, the tools that you gave me aren't enough, as they only work for the most basic of upgrades. I need more advanced tools - they shouldn't be too rare to find. Could you find them for me?
Sadly, the tools that you gave me aren't enough, as they only work for the most basic of upgrades. I need more advanced tools - they shouldn't be too rare to find. Could you find them for me?
Much appreciated. A big "thank you" from everybody here.
Find %s
Seryoga, a military technician, has asked me to find %s.
I'm tired of rummaging around for BTR parts... It's time to get our guys equipped with some proper gear. I could use a different kind of tools - calibration tools. Can you provide me with those?
I'm tired of rummaging around for BTR parts... It's time to get our guys equipped with some proper gear. I could use a different kind of tools - calibration tools. Can you provide me with those?
Amazing. Never thought I'd see such sophisticated technology again... especially around here. And you won't stop me from giving you a fine discount.

Training Day: Speak to Fanatic

Training Day: Speak to Fanatic

Training day: Put the Jellyfish Artefact inside the Lead Container
Fanatic seems to be one of the more experienced stalkers in the village. He has decided to teach me a trick or two.
Training Day - Challenge: Find the Stash
Training Day - Challenge: Speak to Fanatic
My next challenge is one of perception - I have to find a stash located somewhere in the Rookie Village. Fanatic called it a "nest egg" - maybe that's a clue?
Training Day - Rite of Passage: Clear out the Vehicle Station
Training Day - Rite of Passage: Speak to Fanatic
Training Day - Rite of Passage: Return to the Village
Training Day - Rite of Passage: Speak to Fanatic
This is the final and most important task Fanatic has given me. Together, we are going to get rid of the bandits at the vehicle station.
Destroy the mutant lair
Fanatic has asked me to destroy a mutant lair in order to protect the rookies in the village and any other stalkers passing through the Cordon.

We've got a big problem. The mutants have found a new spot to settle down at, and every day in the Cordon has been getting more and more dangerous with those things around - we just can't let them grow in numbers. You're gonna have to head over there and take out anything you find. Everyone here will be in your debt if you get it done. What do you say?
Great work. Thanks to you, the area will be safer for the rookies. Here's your reward.
Find a Battery artefact
Fanatic has asked me to find a Battery artefact for a rookie.

So, here's the deal. A rookie of ours went to Agroprom recently, all prepared for a merry adventure with a pistol in his right hand and a detector in his left. He scavenged some anomalous area for goodies and ended up finding an artefact. On his way back to the village some army patrol stopped him and took his artefact along with the rest of his stuff - now he's just sitting there, absolutely devastated by what happened. It was his first artefact, and they call it a Battery. I would go look for it myself, but I can't leave the rookies alone - they need some protection, and they've still got a lot to learn. So, will you help him out?
Ah, you've found a Battery? Excellent. I think the stalker will be happy - I sure don't need him whining and sobbing all day... Gets annoying putting up with all of that. Anyway, thanks for the help.
Return the TOZ-34 Bizon and ammunition to Hip for payment
Find a TOZ-34 Bizon and ammunition for Hip's client
Hip told me a wealthy client is willing to pay an exhorbitant amount for a TOZ-34 Bizon and 20 12x70 rounds. Problem is, no famous trader south of the Barrier seems to stock them.
Bring artefacts to Sidorovich
Find artefacts for Sidorovich
Hip and I are on a collaborative artefact hunt for Sidorovich. He wants her to bring a Wrenched, Fireball, and Moonlight.
Visit Barman
Visit Barman
Hip wants to further her connections in the Zone by going to see Barman. His job sounded urgent, so we should hurry to secure it.
Meet and talk to Lukash
Meet and talk to Lukash
Hip wants to see Lukash about delivering meds to stalker communities north of the Barrier. It sounds urgent, so we shouldn't waste time.
Take artefact containers to Beard
Take artefact containers to Beard
Barkeep wants us to deliver artefact containers to Beard in Zaton, aboard the Skadovsk.
Take bags with medicine to Loki
Take bags with medicine to Loki
Lukash wants us to deliver medicine to Loki in Jupiter, at Yanov Station.
Some jackass keeps shooting at the speaker, I have no idea if it's some stalker from the village or maybe even somebody in here. Anyway, I need some parts to repair it. Can you look for them?
Find the items
